Gregório Lorenzo Acácio

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/4627439337605197
  • Última atualização do currículo em 20/05/2019

Medicinal degree from Universidade de Taubaté (1990),title of specialist in gynecology and obstetrics, concentration area ultrasound and fetal medicine from Febrasgo. Master in gynecology and obstetrics from Universidade Estadual de Campinas (1999) and Ph.D in gynecology and obstetrics from Universidade Estadual de Campinas (2004), both papers in fetal medicine. Professor at university of Taubaté. Leader of a national research group in fetal surgery and fetal malformation (CNPq). Special interest in fetoscopy (fetal endoscopic surgery) for the treatment of spina bifida (meningomyelocele), complicated twin pregnancies (twin to twin transfusion syndrome, selective IUGR), congenital diafragmatic hernia, congenital infection and ultrasound in obstetrics. I participated in the first fetoscopy for the treatment of spina bifida in 2013, so Brazil was the second country in the world where this procedure was ever performed.In vitro and in vivo hands-on training at the following centers that initiated the technique of correction of myelomeningocele by fetoscopy: Israel, Chile, United States (New York and Pasadena-California), Italy (Milan). (Texto informado pelo autor)
